description: Speed up your site and create a smoother viewing experience by loading images as visitors scroll down the screen, instead of all at once.
author: Automattic

scripts.build: yarn install-if-deps-outdated && yarn clean && yarn build-js
scripts.build-production: yarn distclean && yarn install --production=false && yarn build-production-js
scripts.build-production-js: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production yarn build-js && yarn validate-es5 ./dist/
